ontology_schema.label: Legal Case
ontology_schema.description: The root node for all legal cases.

ontology_schema.label: Criminal Case
ontology_schema.description: Cases involving criminal offenses.

ontology_schema.label: Violent Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving physical harm or threat of harm.

ontology_schema.label: Sexual Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to sexual violence or exploitation.

ontology_schema.label: Rape (IPC 376)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of rape.

ontology_schema.label: Kidnapping (IPC 363)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of kidnapping from lawful guardianship.

ontology_schema.label: Sexual Harassment (IPC 354A)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of sexual harassment and punishment for sexual harassment.

ontology_schema.label: Assault/Hurt
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving hurt or assault.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily causing hurt (IPC 323)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of voluntarily causing simple hurt.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons (IPC 324)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons or means.

ontology_schema.label: Attempt to Murder (IPC 307)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of attempt to murder.

ontology_schema.label: Property Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses against property.

ontology_schema.label: Theft
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving the taking of property dishonestly.

ontology_schema.label: Theft in dwelling house (IPC 380)
ontology_schema.description: Theft committed in any building, tent or vessel used as a human dwelling.

ontology_schema.label: Mischief causing damage (IPC 427)
ontology_schema.description: Mischief causing damage to the amount of fifty rupees or upwards.

ontology_schema.label: Robbery and Extortion
ontology_schema.description: Offenses where theft or extortion is compounded by violence or threat.

ontology_schema.label: Robbery (IPC 392)
ontology_schema.description: Punishment for robbery.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily causing hurt in committing robbery (IPC 394)
ontology_schema.description: Voluntarily causing hurt in committing or attempting to commit robbery.

ontology_schema.label: Robbery or dacoity, with attempt to cause death or grievous hurt (IPC 397)
ontology_schema.description: Robbery or dacoity, with attempt to cause death or grievous hurt.

ontology_schema.label: Extortion (IPC 384)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of extortion.

ontology_schema.label: Dacoity
ontology_schema.description: Offenses committed by five or more persons working together to commit or attempt to commit robbery.

ontology_schema.label: Punishment for dacoity (IPC 395)
ontology_schema.description: Punishment for the offense of dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Trespass
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to unauthorized entry onto property.

ontology_schema.label: House-trespass after preparation for hurt, assault or wrongful restraint (IPC 452)
ontology_schema.description: House-trespass having made preparation for causing hurt to any person, or for assaulting any person, or for wrongfully restraining any person, or for putting any person in fear of hurt, or of assault, or of wrongful restraint.

ontology_schema.label: Lurking house-trespass or house-breaking by night in order to commit offence punishable with imprisonment (IPC 457)
ontology_schema.description: Lurking house-trespass or house-breaking by night in order to commit offence punishable with imprisonment.

ontology_schema.label: Preparatory Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to preparation for a future crime, often dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Making preparation to commit dacoity (IPC 399)
ontology_schema.description: Making any preparation for the purpose of committing dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Assembling for purpose of committing dacoity (IPC 402)
ontology_schema.description: Assembling with five or more persons for the purpose of committing dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Other Offense
ontology_schema.description: A catch-all category for offenses not classified under the main criminal branches.

ontology_schema.label: Terrorism Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to acts of terrorism or unlawful activities against the State (e.g., POTA, UAPA).

ontology_schema.label: Matrimonial Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses primarily arising out of marital relationships.

ontology_schema.label: Cruelty by Husband or Relatives (IPC 498A)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of subjection of a married woman to cruelty by her husband or his relatives.

ontology_schema.label: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act (PWDVA)
ontology_schema.description: Cases under the Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005.

ontology_schema.label: Family Law Dispute
ontology_schema.description: Cases primarily governed by civil/family laws (e.g., HMA, Divorce, Maintenance).

ontology_schema.label: Maintenance Dispute
ontology_schema.description: Disputes primarily concerning maintenance orders under various Acts (e.g., HMA, CrPC).
